item.title: [PI] Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

AyyDer, I have buttons that I need to have options for and this is what I have so far:

case 47169: sendOption2("Check Players Bank", "Open My Bank"); c.dialogueAction = 77; break; case 47170: sendOption4("Donator", "Super Donator", "Moderator", "Administrator"); c.dialogueAction = 78; break;
But when I went into the server to test and see if it worked, it did not. How would I make it send Options that players could choose?
[hr]
[hr]
Now I tried this:

case 47169: c.getDH().sendOption2("Check Players Bank", "Open My Bank"); c.dialogueAction = 77; break;
but I ended up with these errors:

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:436: error: sendOption2(St ring,String) has private access in DialogueHandler c.getDH().sendOption2("Check Players Bank", "Open My Bank"); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Could someone assist me please?

Read full topic
